attributes.action: Make the super rich; People and companies pay more tax based on net earnings.
attributes.additional_details:
Their are far too many super rich people avoiding tax when the super poor are suffering in silence. 

Parliament should do as they vow and this is support the best interests of the people of the UK and not just or only the interests of the super rich that pillage the UK for funds through business and give very little back. 

They think giving people work is the right way to pay Tax. This is very wrong.
attributes.background:
The super rich of the UK have been dodging the proper tax rate for years by using charity's and offsetting the amount of people they employ to reduce the amount of tax they pay. 

Also multi-national companies that are based in the UK should pay a net tax on world based earnings not just the UK.
